description:
Join Over 11,698 Students and Sign Up to one of My Courses Today!

Last Updated: Febuary 20th, 2016.

In this quick FREE course you will learn how to set-up and install Wordpress locally on your computer. This will allow you to easier build Wordpress websites wherever you go even without an active internet connection.

This is also a great way to work in Wordpress and create websites without having to spend any money on domain names or web hosting. This course is great for Wordpress beginners and those who are just getting started with Web Development in general.

You should be able to get through this course in less than 30 minutes and before you know it you will have your own local web development server up and running.

Enroll today and I look forward to seeing you in the course!
title: How To Create a Local Wordpress Environment
